header: Starting... "better doing it than stay waiting"
title: Content introduction
description1: I have always wanted and pursued the desire to communicate information related to technology and this is one of the steps to make it a reality.
description2: The target of each section is to try to put the topic being discussed into the best perspective in order to understand it.
description3: And, of course, hoping you enjoy.
subtitle: About the topics
topics_p: The topics will be mathematics and science as separate sections. And of course, computer science as a main topic.
